[?]
× See 8TALLET for more information on the building

Created using three.js, FreeCAD, and many hours of drawing by Parit

To rotate the model use the left mouse button or one finger

To zoom in/out on the model use the mouse scroller or pinch with two fingers

To move the model use the right mouse button or two fingers

Select a home to be able to access a detailed floorplan or to see other homes of the same home type

Use the filters section to show/hide entrances, levels or homes with certain numbers of rooms

Choose the reset filters button to show all homes

Use the reset view button to return to the front-on view

The animation is quite resource intensive even when static so it is advised not to have it open if it is not being used
